item.title: Launchctl | Edit System Domain Config
item.description: Launchctl | How to edit system domain configs Question I messed up my launchctl configs while I was trying to disable FortiClient from starting on startup. I tried to use launchctl disable ... for services but ended up adding wrong entries to disable configuration. Answer Edit /private/var/db/com.apple.xpc.launchd/disabled* files and delete wrong data What I Learned How to login to single-user mode on macOS. Press Command-S on system boot
